name: Fade
storyline:
In the land of Baltane, the king has passed away due to unknown circumstances. His son, King Gaillard has taken his place only to find a slew of issues undertaking the kingdom. In this time of turmoil, a hero of no renown arrives to make an impact with an unknown origin.

Fade is a Narrative Driven Action RPG that combines the combat of the souls series with the narrative direction of Fable. In Fade players will be tasked with exploring the settlements of Celeste, Solemn, Whisper, and The Baltane Capital in order stop the Wildlings Lords and their destructive plot. Take on side quests and side hustles to craft new items and earn new equipment.
